item.description:
SOMETHING NEW FOR A SUNDAY GET TOGETHER!

One of our new members Joni P from Stoughton volunteered to book the clubhouse at her condo complex for a Sunday Brunch, etc.


Bagels, lox, and all that stuff, along with homemade ethnic goodies and, “you never know who!”

Sunday, September 21, 2008 ~ 11:00 a.m – 4:00 p.m

Knollsbrook Condominium Complex Club House
70 Erin Road
Stoughton, MA 02072

Deadline September 21, 2008
$10.00 with RSVP
$12.00 at the door


Do we want to play games? pictionary, charades,team jeopardy, trivial pursuit.

Yes, if there's a big screen TV we can watch football!

click on this to see our flyer:
http://files.meetup.c...
item.how_to_find_us: directions sent in an email on Sunday 9/14 -or use Mapquest from your home
item.name: Brunch, etc
